Detailed Description

Objects of this class contains data about one connection that is needed when the turndescriptions are set.

E.g. the angle, roadclass, ramp-, roundabout- and divided flags etc.

OldConnection *  c,
byte  roadClass,
bool  roundabout,
bool  ramp,
bool  divided,
bool  ismulti,
ItemTypes::entryrestriction_t  restr
) 
 

Creates a ConnectionElement-object.

Parameters:
a The angel of this connection.
c The connection.
roundabout True if this connection comes from a roundabout-segment, false otherwise.
ramp True if this connection comes from a ramp-segment, false otherwise.
divided True if this connection comes from a divided-segment, false otherwise.
ismulti True if this segment is multiDigitalised
restr The restrictions {for the node that this connection pass}, not the node where it start!

Definition at line 120 of file SetTurnDescriptions.h.

ItemTypes::entryrestriction_t ConnectionElement::m_passNodeRestrictions
 

The restrictions of the node that this connection passes.

The situation looks something like this: {verbatim} O (I)

(II) X O************O If the connection is from node (I) to (II) then the entry restrictions in node X is stored in this member variable. {verbatim}
